content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Petru Lucinschi

This is a list of presidential trips made by Petru Lucinschi, the 2nd President of Moldova.

|-

! rowspan="1" width="150" |Dates
! rowspan="1" width="150" |Notes

|
|-

|8 May 1997
|Met with Igor Smirnov.
|-

|28 May 1997
|50th anniversary of the Marshall Plan.
|-

|22-24 June 1997
|
|-
| Paris, France
|7-9 September 1997
|
|-

|27 November 1997

|-

|28-29 November 1997
|
|-
| Madrid, Spain
|9 July 1997
